OP06-001.name: Uta OP06-001
OP06-001.effect: [When Attacking] You may trash 1 {FILM} type card from your hand: Give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters −2000 power during this turn. Then, add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and rest it.

OP06-002.name: Inazuma OP06-002
OP06-002.effect: If this Character has 7000 power or more, this Character gains [Banish].

OP06-003.name: Emporio Ivankov OP06-003
OP06-003.effect: [On Play] Look at 3 cards from the top of your deck and play up to 1 {Revolutionary Army} type Character card with 5000 power or less. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

OP06-004.name: Baron Omatsuri OP06-004
OP06-004.effect: [On Play] Play up to 1 [Lily Carnation] from your hand.

OP06-006.name: Saga OP06-006
OP06-006.effect: [DON!! x1] [When Attacking] This Character gains +1000 power until the start of your next turn. Then, trash 1 of your {FILM} type Characters at the end of this turn.

OP06-007.name: Shanks OP06-007
OP06-007.effect: [On Play] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 10000 power or less.

OP06-009.name: Shuraiya OP06-009
OP06-009.effect: [Blocker] [When Attacking]/[On Block] [Once Per Turn] This Character becomes the same power as your opponent's Leader until the start of your next turn.

OP06-010.name: Douglas Bullet OP06-010
OP06-010.effect: If your Leader has the {FILM} type, this Character gains [Blocker].

OP06-011.name: Tot Musica OP06-011
OP06-011.effect: [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] You may rest 1 of your [Uta] cards: This Character gains +5000 power during this turn.

OP06-012.name: Bear King OP06-012
OP06-012.effect: If your opponent has a Leader or Character with a base power of 6000 or more, this Character cannot be K.O.'d in battle.

OP06-013.name: Monkey D. Luffy OP06-013
OP06-013.effect: [On Play] Look at 3 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {FILM} type card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order. [Trigger] Activate this card's [On Play] effect.

OP06-014.name: Ratchet OP06-014
OP06-014.effect: [On Your Opponent's Attack] You may trash any number of {FILM} type cards from your hand. Your Leader or 1 of your Characters gains +1000 power during this battle for every card trashed.

OP06-015.name: Lily Carnation OP06-015
OP06-015.effect: [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] You may trash 1 of your Characters with 6000 power or more: Play up to 1 {FILM} type Character card with 2000 to 5000 power from your trash rested.

OP06-016.name: Raise Max OP06-016
OP06-016.effect: [Activate: Main] You may place this Character at the bottom of the owner's deck: Give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters −3000 power during this turn.

OP06-017.name: Meteor-Strike of Love OP06-017
OP06-017.effect: [Main]/[Counter] You may add 1 card from the top of your Life cards to your hand: Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +3000 power during this turn.

OP06-018.name: Gum-Gum King Kong Gatling OP06-018
OP06-018.effect: [Main] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +3000 power during this turn. Then, if your opponent has a Character with 7000 power or more, up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +1000 power during this turn. [Trigger] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 5000 power or less.

OP06-019.name: Blue Dragon Seal Water Stream OP06-019
OP06-019.effect: [Main] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 5000 power or less. [Trigger] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 4000 power or less.

OP06-020.name: Hody Jones OP06-020
OP06-020.effect: [Activate: Main] You may rest this Leader: Rest up to 1 of your opponent's DON!! cards or Characters with a cost of 3 or less. Then, you cannot add Life cards to your hand using your own effects during this turn.

OP06-021.name: Perona OP06-021
OP06-021.effect: [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] Choose one: • Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 4 or less. • Give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters −1 cost during this turn.

OP06-022.name: Yamato OP06-022
OP06-022.effect: [Double Attack] [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] If your opponent has 3 or less Life cards, give up to 2 rested DON!! cards to 1 of your Characters.

OP06-023.name: Arlong OP06-023
OP06-023.effect: [On Play] You may trash 1 card from your hand: Up to 1 of your opponent's rested Leader cannot attack until the end of your opponent's next turn. [Trigger] Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 4 or less.

OP06-024.name: Ikaros Much OP06-024
OP06-024.effect: [On Play] If your Leader has the {New Fish-Man Pirates} type, play up to 1 {Fish-Man} type Character card with a cost of 4 or less from your hand. Then, add 1 card from the top of your Life cards to your hand.

OP06-025.name: Camie OP06-025
OP06-025.effect: [On Play] Look at 4 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Fish-Man} or {Merfolk} type card other than [Camie] and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

OP06-026.name: Koushirou OP06-026
OP06-026.effect: [On Play] Set up to 1 of your <Slash> attribute Characters with a cost of 4 or less as active. Then, you cannot attack a Leader during this turn.

OP06-027.name: Gyro OP06-027
OP06-027.effect: [On K.O.] Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 3 or less.

OP06-028.name: Zeo OP06-028
OP06-028.effect: [DON!! x1] [When Attacking] If your Leader has the {New Fish-Man Pirates} type, set up to 1 of your DON!! cards as active and this Character gains +1000 power during this turn. Then, add 1 card from the top of your Life cards to your hand.

OP06-029.name: Daruma OP06-029
OP06-029.effect: [DON!! x1] [When Attacking] [Once Per Turn] If your Leader has the {New Fish-Man Pirates} type, set this Character as active and this Character gains +1000 power during this turn. Then, add 1 card from the top of your Life cards to your hand.

OP06-030.name: Dosun OP06-030
OP06-030.effect: [When Attacking] If your Leader has the {New Fish-Man Pirates} type, this Character cannot be K.O.'d in battle and gains +2000 power until the start of your next turn. Then, add 1 card from the top of your Life cards to your hand.

OP06-031.name: Hatchan OP06-031
OP06-031.effect: [Trigger] Play up to 1 {Fish-Man} or {Merfolk} type Character card with a cost of 3 or less from your hand.

OP06-033.name: Vander Decken IX OP06-033
OP06-033.effect: [On Play] You may trash 1 {Fish-Man} type card from your hand or 1 [The Ark Noah] from your hand or field: K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's rested Characters.

OP06-034.name: Hyouzou OP06-034
OP06-034.effect: [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 4 or less and this Character gains +1000 power during this turn. Then, add 1 card from the top of your Life cards to your hand.

OP06-035.name: Hody Jones OP06-035
OP06-035.effect: [Rush] [On Play] Rest up to a total of 2 of your opponent's Characters or DON!! cards. Then, add 1 card from the top of your Life cards to your hand.

OP06-036.name: Ryuma OP06-036
OP06-036.effect: [On Play]/[On K.O.] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's rested Characters with a cost of 4 or less.

OP06-038.name: The Billion-fold World Trichiliocosm OP06-038
OP06-038.effect: [Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +2000 power during this battle. Then, if you have 8 or more rested cards, that card gains an additional +2000 power during this battle. [Trigger] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's rested Characters with a cost of 3 or less.

OP06-039.name: You Ain't Even Worth Killing Time!! OP06-039
OP06-039.effect: [Main] Choose one: • Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 6 or less. • K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's rested Characters with a cost of 6 or less. [Trigger] Activate this card's [Main] effect.

OP06-040.name: Shark Arrows OP06-040
OP06-040.effect: [Main] K.O. up to 2 of your opponent's rested Characters with a cost of 3 or less. [Trigger] Activate this card's [Main] effect.

OP06-041.name: The Ark Noah OP06-041
OP06-041.effect: [On Play] Rest all of your opponent's Characters. [Trigger] Play this card.

OP06-042.name: Vinsmoke Reiju OP06-042
OP06-042.effect: [Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When a DON!! card on your field is returned to your DON!! deck, draw 1 card.

OP06-043.name: Aramaki OP06-043
OP06-043.effect: [Blocker] [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] You may trash 1 card from your hand and place 1 Character with a cost of 2 or less at the bottom of the owner's deck: This Character gains +3000 power during this turn.

OP06-044.name: Gion OP06-044
OP06-044.effect: [Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When your opponent activates an Event, your opponent must place 1 card from their hand at the bottom of their deck.

OP06-045.name: Kuzan OP06-045
OP06-045.effect: [On Play] Draw 2 cards and place 2 cards from your hand at the bottom of your deck in any order.

OP06-046.name: Sakazuki OP06-046
OP06-046.effect: [On Play] Place up to 1 Character with a cost of 2 or less at the bottom of the owner's deck.

OP06-047.name: Charlotte Pudding OP06-047
OP06-047.effect: [On Play] Your opponent returns all cards in their hand to their deck and shuffles their deck. Then, your opponent draws 5 cards.

OP06-048.name: Zeff OP06-048
OP06-048.effect: [Your Turn] When your opponent activates [Blocker] or an Event, if your Leader has the {East Blue} type, you may trash 4 cards from the top of your deck.

OP06-050.name: Tashigi OP06-050
OP06-050.effect: [On Play] Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Navy} type card other than [Tashigi] and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
